install: git submodule update && cd strapi && npm i && cd ../nuxt && npm i && cd ../
generate-env:development: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/strapux/src/utils/build-env.js && mv strapi/.env strapi-development.env && mv nuxt/.env nuxt-development.env
generate-env:staging: NODE_ENV=staging node_modules/strapux/src/utils/build-env.js && mv strapi/.env strapi-staging.env && mv nuxt/.env nuxt-staging.env
generate-env:production: NODE_ENV=production node_modules/strapux/src/utils/build-env.js && mv strapi/.env strapi-production.env && mv nuxt/.env nuxt-production.env
